pages.body:
List only stuff that you payed directly with Bitcoin. That means the value transfer was in Bitcoin. The motivation is to demonstrate to new people how useful crypto currency can be in the real world. The first question is always where it can be spent. There are great sites like [CoinMap](https://coinmap.org) that show where one could spend. But I want to collect here places where people actually took advantage and did spend.

*OK to list here:*

* The recipient keeps the BTC for later spending or for holding long time.
* The recipient instantly converted to Fiat, e.g using a service such as [inapay](https://inapay.ch/) or bitpay.

*Not OK to list here:*

* You used a Visa debit card that is backed by Bitcoin
* You payed the bill with [Moon](https://paywithmoon.com/), [Bitwala](https://www.bitwala.com/), [Lamium](https://lamium.io/payments/) or [Bity](https://bity.com), and the merchant received FIAT

The important part is that the merchant knowingly accepted Bitcoin. 

Try to keep the order roughly descending in value.


* [Tesla Model S electric car](https://ts.la) (used) from a private individual
* KnC Saturn Bitcoin ASIC miner
* [Horst Avegno Sofa](https://www.horst-collection.ch/en/products/sofas) from [Möbel Schaller](https://www.moebelschaller.ch/)
* [Horst Chiasso Sofa](https://www.horst-collection.ch/en/products/sofas) from [Möbel Schaller](https://www.moebelschaller.ch/)
* 3 x [Ozone XXLite 2](https://flyozone.com/paragliders/de/products/gliders/xxlite-2/info/) single skin paraglider with [F*Lite](https://flyozone.com/paragliders/de/products/harnesses/f-lite/info/) harness from [WinWings](http://winwings.ch)
* [Dell XPS 13 developer edition](http://dell.com) notebook from Dell USA
* High end workstation from [HighqualityPC](http://www.highqualitypc.ch/)
* [Purism Librem 13](http://puri.sm) notebook from Purism
* [Advance Lightness 2 paraglider harness](https://advance.ch/de/lightness/) including reserve from [WinWings](http://winwings.ch)
* Motorized L-shaped standing desk with corpus and accessories from [Galaxus](https://galaxus.ch)
* [Advanced Bitcoin Course](https://www.21lectures.com/advanced-course) from [21Lectures](https://www.21lectures.com)
* Laundry dryer and hanger from [Galaxus](https://galaxus.ch)
* Ortovox skiing jacket and pants from [Galaxus](https://galaxus.ch)
* Intel NUC i7 skull candy computer from [Scan](https://scan.co.uk)
* [Dell U4919DW](https://www.dell.com/de-ch/shop/accessories/apd/210-argk) ultra wide 49 inch computer screen from  [Digitec](https://digitec.ch)
* Summer tires and TPMS from [Streit Imports](https://www.streit-imports.ch)
* Nokian Winter tires from [Mercedes Benz Zug](https://www.mercedes-benz-auto-center-zug.ch)
* Nokian Winter tires from [Auto Kappeler](http://auto-kappeler.ch)
* Fold away guest bed and mattress from [Galaxus](https://galaxus.ch)
* Weed
* Pirelli Summer tires from [Galaxus](https://galaxus.ch)
* Michelin Summer tires from [Galaxus](https://galaxus.ch)
* Leather chairs for the kitchen table from [Pfister](https://www.pfister.ch) through [Galaxus](https://galaxus.ch)
* Rent for a holiday flat at [Agriturismo il falcone](http://www.agriturismoilfalcone.it)
* [Skytraxx](http://www.skytraxx.eu/) flight computer with flarm and fanet from [WinWings](http://winwings.ch)
* Teeth repairs at [Dentist Dr Hussain](http://www.zahnarzthussain.ch)

* [ADE!Geranium](http://www.energiegenossenschaft.ch/wp2/produkte/ade-geranium/) solar panel from [Energiegenossenschaft](http://www.energiegenossenschaft.ch)
* [Tentsile Stingray](https://www.tentsile.com/collections/3-person-tree-tents/products/stingray-3-person-tree-tent) tree tent with rope ladder from [Galaxus](https://galaxus.ch)

List only stuff that you payed directly with Bitcoin. That means the value transfer was in Bitcoin. The motivation is to demonstrate to new people how useful crypto currency can be in the real world. The first question is always where it can be spent. There are great sites like [CoinMap](https://coinmap.org) that show where one could spend. But I want to collect here places where people actually took advantage and did spend.

*OK to list here:*

* The recipient keeps the BTC for later spending or for holding long time.
* The recipient instantly converted to Fiat, e.g using a service such as [inapay](https://inapay.ch/) or bitpay.

*Not OK to list here:*

* You used a Visa debit card that is backed by Bitcoin
* You payed the bill with [Moon](https://paywithmoon.com/), [Bitwala](https://www.bitwala.com/), [Lamium](https://lamium.io/payments/) or [Bity](https://bity.com), and the merchant received FIAT

The important part is that the merchant knowingly accepted Bitcoin. 

Try to keep the order roughly descending in value.

* KnC Saturn Bitcoin ASIC miner
